TextBlock.Text: OENO: This research station has been established to study the spacial distortions located within <Color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</Color>.
CYCAD: Our tribe has spent far too long ignoring this place as a result of the tragedy that occured here.
OENO: Our research is progressing rapidly. We have determined that the space within Dark Bramble is distorted to an impossible degree. This space cannot possibly exist within a single location.
CYCAD: Hypothesis: when an object enters Dark Bramble, the interior manifests elsewhere within a pocket of space linked to this one.
OENO: By studying the sky shortly after an object has entered Dark Bramble, we believe we have located the space the interior occupies.
CYCAD: We have just been informed that the <Color=orange>Sun Station</Color> is nearly complete! Further exploration of this phenomenon must wait for a subsequent time.
